title: Reconstruction: The reconstruction in whole or part of a building which has ceased to exist due to fire, natural collapse, demolition having been declared unsafe or which is likely to be demolished by or under an order of the Corporation or the Bombay Housing and Area Development Board and for which the necessary certificate has been given by either the said Corporation or the Board shall be allowed
clause_text: Reconstruction: The reconstruction in whole or part of a building which has ceased to exist due to fire, natural collapse, demolition having been declared unsafe or which is likely to be demolished by or under an order of the Corporation or the Bombay Housing and Area Development Board and for which the necessary certificate has been given by either the said Corporation or the Board shall be allowed .
